# Introduction

Here are our Pathfinder TTRPG builds! We make these Pathfinder TTRPG builds live on stream at https://www.twitch.tv/DanielAndMaya!

## Pathfinder 2E Builds

### Druids

- [PinkyTheImposter's Catfolk Druid] - A Catfolk Druid that can beat you unmercifully but also take care of you afterwards.

### Monks

- [Xiota86's Angy Monk] - A Half-Orc Monk that yells, rages, and punches a lot.
- [TheRealGameflamingo's Monk-ey] - A Dragonball-inspired Vanaran Monk that has chargeable attacks.

### Oracles

- [ItMeTai's Battle Oracle] - A Human Oracle that is huge support to his allies.

### Rangers

- [Torchic's Shadow] - A Fetchling Ranger that specializes in stalking and singling out their prey with extreme long range crossbow shots.

### Summoners

- [ Soup's God of Recycling] - A Goblin Summoner who believes he's the "God of Recycling" deprived of his godhood.
